name: Nozoku Rush
description:
Subtract tiles down to zero to clear them off the board. Maximize your score with big combos and show your friends who's boss on the leaderboards!

Rush Mode:
New tiles fall faster and faster. Don't let them reach the top!

Race Mode:
Score big points before time's up! Earn bonus time with every move.

Turn on Extreme Mode to crank up the intensity!

Visit http://cbox.me for more fun :)
